Set curl options, proxy, and basic auth

Source: R/set.R
crul-options.Rd

Set curl options, proxy, and basic auth

set_opts(...)

set_proxy(x)

set_auth(x)

set_headers(...)

crul_settings(reset = FALSE)

Arguments

...

For set_opts() any curl option in the set curl::curl_options(). For set_headers() a named list of headers
x

For set_proxy() a proxy object made with proxy(). For set_auth() an auth object made with auth()
reset

(logical) reset all settings (aka, delete them). Default: FALSE

Details

the mock option will be seen in output of crul_settings() but is set via the function mock()

Examples

# get settings
crul_settings()
#> mock :  logi FALSE

# curl options
set_opts(timeout_ms = 1000)
crul_settings()
#> mock :  logi FALSE
#> opts : List of 1
#>  $ timeout_ms: num 1000
set_opts(timeout_ms = 4000)
crul_settings()
#> mock :  logi FALSE
#> opts : List of 1
#>  $ timeout_ms: num 4000
set_opts(verbose = TRUE)
crul_settings()
#> mock :  logi FALSE
#> opts : List of 2
#>  $ timeout_ms: num 4000
#>  $ verbose   : logi TRUE
# NOT RUN {
HttpClient$new('https://httpbin.org')$get('get')
# }

# basic authentication
set_auth(auth(user = "foo", pwd = "bar", auth = "basic"))
crul_settings()
#> crul_auth : List of 2
#>  $ userpwd : chr "foo:bar"
#>  $ httpauth: num 1
#> mock :  logi FALSE
#> opts : List of 2
#>  $ timeout_ms: num 4000
#>  $ verbose   : logi TRUE

# proxies
set_proxy(proxy("http://97.77.104.22:3128"))
crul_settings()
#> crul_auth : List of 2
#>  $ userpwd : chr "foo:bar"
#>  $ httpauth: num 1
#> mock :  logi FALSE
#> opts : List of 2
#>  $ timeout_ms: num 4000
#>  $ verbose   : logi TRUE
#> proxies : List of 3
#>  $ proxy    : chr "97.77.104.22"
#>  $ proxyport: num 3128
#>  $ proxyauth: num 1

# headers
crul_settings(TRUE) # reset first
#> mock :  logi FALSE
set_headers(foo = "bar")
crul_settings()
#> headers : List of 1
#>  $ foo: chr "bar"
#> mock :  logi FALSE
set_headers(`User-Agent` = "hello world")
crul_settings()
#> headers : List of 2
#>  $ foo       : chr "bar"
#>  $ User-Agent: chr "hello world"
#> mock :  logi FALSE
# NOT RUN {
set_opts(verbose = TRUE)
HttpClient$new('https://httpbin.org')$get('get')
# }

# reset
crul_settings(TRUE)
#> mock :  logi FALSE
crul_settings()
#> mock :  logi FALSE

# works with async functions
## Async
set_opts(verbose = TRUE)
cc <- Async$new(urls = c(
    'https://httpbin.org/get?a=5',
    'https://httpbin.org/get?foo=bar'))
(res <- cc$get())
#> [[1]]
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/get?a=5
#>   request_headers: 
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     content-encoding: gzip
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     date: Wed, 24 Jul 2019 22:03:25 GMT
#>     referrer-policy: no-referrer-when-downgrade
#>     server: nginx
#>     x-content-type-options: nosniff
#>     x-frame-options: DENY
#>     x-xss-protection: 1; mode=block
#>     content-length: 234
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>   params: 
#>     a: 5
#>   status: 200
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/get?foo=bar
#>   request_headers: 
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     content-encoding: gzip
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     date: Wed, 24 Jul 2019 22:03:25 GMT
#>     referrer-policy: no-referrer-when-downgrade
#>     server: nginx
#>     x-content-type-options: nosniff
#>     x-frame-options: DENY
#>     x-xss-protection: 1; mode=block
#>     content-length: 238
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>   params: 
#>     foo: bar
#>   status: 200
#> 

## AsyncVaried
set_opts(verbose = TRUE)
set_headers(stuff = "things")
reqlist <- list(
  HttpRequest$new(url = "https://httpbin.org/get")$get(),
  HttpRequest$new(url = "https://httpbin.org/post")$post())
out <- AsyncVaried$new(.list = reqlist)
out$request()
